          <title>
            <string language="en">Image formation in a flat mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bildanordnung in einem flachen Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation d'image dans un miroir plat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação da imagem em um espelho liso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione di immagine in uno specchio piano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός εικόνας σε έναν επίπεδο καθρέφτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de la imagen en un espejo plano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the image that you'll see using a flat or plane mirror.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirrors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <structure>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt dem Bild, daß Sie mit 
einem Ebene- oder Flächespiegel sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve à l'image que vous 
verrez à l'aide d'un miroir d'appartement ou d'avion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra à imagem que você 
verá usando um espelho do plano ou do plano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica all'immagine che 
vedrete per mezzo di uno specchio dell'aereo o del piano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εικόνα ότι θα 
δείτε τη χρησιμοποίηση ενός επίπεδου ή καθρέφτη 
αεροπλάνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a imagen que usted 
verá con un espejo del plano o del plano.</string>
          </description>
